name: Aarow Industries Inc.
overview:
Aarow Industries Inc. is an innovative think tank and producer of unique product ideas.

Aarow Industries Inc. produces unique and innovative inventions for select markets. Some of these innovations center on the idea that we can discover new technology and create a fully sustainable system by which to live on this planet.

Privately held and operated, Aarow Industries Inc. seeks to constantly introduce new innovations to individual markets as deemed appropriate by the Board of Directors. Scrutinized on an individual basis for viability, ideas will be accepted and developed into an active project based on ROI potential and longevity.

Aarow Industries Inc. currently offers 3D Printing services to the general public.

It is not our intention to mislead consumers into believing we are like other “invention firms”. Aarow Industries Inc. does not accept Invention idea submissions from the general public.
